description.narrative: The objective of the restructured project is to assist the Recipient to develop the capacity of the AUWSSC for operational management and investment planning and implementation.

condition.narrative: CAWSS will be fully corporatized, i.e., its statutes approved, its Board of Directors appointed and its Management Team appointedby December 31, 2006.
The Recipient shall appoint : (i) An operations officer in charge of assistance to smaller towns; and (ii) in each SBU, a head ofth e SBU, a financial management specialist and a technical manager.
The Recipient shall appoint or cause to be appointed in AUWSSC, a finance manager and a deputy technical manager.
The Recipient shall appoint or cause to be appointed in each SBU, a head of the SBU.
The Recipient shall cause to be submitted to the Association for review, a first annual report by the auditors referred to inSection V(c).
The Recipient shall cause to be submitted to the Association for review, a first semi-annual report by the auditors referred to inSection V(c).
The Recipient shall no later than June 30, 2007, appoint or cause to be appointed for the Project, independent external auditorstocarry out audits of AUWSSC's corporate financial statements.
